description: doc: fix and canonicalize links in go1.html

messages.text: http://codereview.appspot.com/5472060/diff/1/doc/go1.html File doc/go1.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5472060/diff/1/doc/go1.html#newcode579 doc/go1.html:579: strconv This URL is wrong in two ways; it's an absolute URL, and it's a link to the wrong package. It should be /pkg/strconv/. I think all the other package links in this doc should also be /pkg/foo/.
I could have sworn I edited the .tmpl file. :|

Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

three things.

1) i think i already localized the links in the CL that's open.
2) the sycall thing is wrong and will be fixed in the CL that's open.
3) see the DO NOT EDIT mark at the top of this file.


i'll fix the #errors tag in the CL that's open.

-rob

subject: code review 5472060: doc: fix and canonicalize links in go1.html
